duties_responsibilities.duty: Warmly greet and assist guests, prioritize guest service over other duties
Train new cashiers and cross-train other associates
Support store management in associate check-ins, check-outs, and loyalty programs
Inform guests of promotions, events, and services, and book appointments for in-store events
Maintain store cleanliness, replenish products, execute planograms, and set up advertising displays
Participate in physical inventory preparation, execution, and follow-up
Receive shipment, ensure register open/close functions are executed properly

education_certification.credential: High school diploma (or equivalent), with 2+ years of relevant work experience (or equivalent combination of education and experience)
